text: Michael Cole (July 3, 1940 – December 10, 2024) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Pete Cochran on the television crime drama The Mod Squad (1968–1973). He was born in Madison, Wisconsin. Cole died on December 10, 2024 at a hospital in Tarzana, California at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Writers from Madison, Wisconsin
title: Michael Cole (actor)
